name: Orders Chat for WooCommerce
author: u2Code

sections.description:
Provide a simple and clean chatroom for your customers. Receive order feedback and improve your services.

The plugin automatically creates a chatroom when users make an order.

âœ… Automated system messages
Keep chats updated with automated messages about status changes or order notes created by 3rd-party plugins.

âœ… Email notifications
You and your customers will be emailed when they have new messages.

âœ… Share files between customers and admins (premium feature)
Control what file types are allowed and their maximum file size.

âœ… Automatically send messages related to products when customers make purchases
Set a message that will be automatically sent to a customer when they purchase a product.

âœ… Images previews in chatrooms
When you or customers attach an image, it can be previewed in a modal box

All features:

  • Instant access to a chatroom from an orders list.
  • Customize the color scheme of the chatroom.
  • Schedule sending messages.
  • Customize your message signature. (Your name as the admin in the chat)
  • See whether customers read messages or not.
  • Set message status as unread.

Check out our site to get more information about the Orders chat for WooCommerce

Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/tier-price-table directory, or install the plugin directly through the WordPress plugins screen.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the WooCommerce->Settings Name screen to configure the plugin

After installing the plugin, set up your own settings

short_description: Allows you to set a specific price for a certain quantity of product. Shows quantity pricing table/blocks/options/dropdown/tooltip.
